name: Jabil Inc.
summary: Jabil Inc. is a leading American multinational manufacturing company specializing in the design, engineering, and production of electronic circuit board assemblies and a wide range of manufacturing services. Headquartered in St. Petersburg, Florida, Jabil operates globally, serving diverse industries through its Electronics Manufacturing Services (EMS) and Diversified Manufacturing Services (DMS) segments. Founded in 1966, the company is publicly traded on the NYSE under the ticker JBL.
